title: OGsmall
author: OGsmall
content: I have always wanted to ask this question is it that there is no opportunity or they do not want to get rich Mate please more to this I am confused here.

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: I don't think that the vast majority of poor people would refuse to be rich, or at least to become less poor. Certainly many people don't mind being considered rich financially, if they don't lack anything vital and are happy with the life they already have.This question is a bit complex because:-being rich does not mean being FIAT rich. Having good health, access to water, food, and having loved ones such as family and friends is already a form of real wealth.-poor people by definition do not have the means to invest (real estate, stocks, cryptos etc..). And how to become rich without investment?Each people, each culture has a different and subjective notion of wealth. Each people and each culture has a different consideration of the threshold at which they qualify as poor / rich. The ways to get out of poverty are not the same depending on where you live, there are places where your economic environment allows it, and others where it is more complex.

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: Several factors; circumstances as is, government aid, and self sabotage.There are times wherein no matter how an individual think of a way to somehow climb the social strata, they wouls be pulled down by circumstances such as lack of resources, capital and the likes which cannot be aided by hardwork alone. Govenment on the other hand is a factor as well because they should be utilizing nation's taxes to give assistance with the countrymen especially to those who are really in need of it. Last is self sabotage wherein an individual has no urge to make a change with one's social status regardless of opportunities around him.

comments.author: jrrsparkles
comments.body: If someone wanted to get rich then they need to create their own opportunity, and talking about poor they do wanted to get rich but for many reasons they can't no matter how much they make. Main reason why everyone can't become rich is simply they don't know anything about how money works even though they use it everyday, they spent money but not give importance to savings then how they can invest and make returns?

comments.author: bbigtart
comments.body: In my opinion, the poor remain poor. The fundamental problem is from the mainset.And a person's mindset is formed from how he grows and develops.1. Family Environment2. Formal Education Environment3. Community environmentWill you later become someone who is passionate, diligent, confident, never give up, broad-minded, always optimistic, tenacious and consistent, or on the contrary, will you become someone who is lazy, lacks enthusiasm, lacks confidence, is narrow-minded, pessimistic and easily gives up? .That's just the foundation, not to mention the other factors beyond that.The point is whether we want to be rich or stay poor, whether we want to fight for it or not, it's not easy, but the goal is definitely achieved.

comments.author: KaliLinux
comments.body: Quote from: OGsmall on March 12, 2023, 03:11:55 PMI have always wanted to ask this question is it that there is no opportunity or they do not want to get rich Mate please more to this I am confused here.What do you mean by "they don't want to get rich" Do you really think there are people out there that don't want to be rich or remain poor  I don't think so. It is more of a situation thing. some times the situation people find themself in prevents them from achieving what they want. Some people have never left or even had the opportunity to leave the remote location they find themself which also can never provide any better opportunity for them. However, let us not forget that some other people are in the best environment but are still not rich, we could even say it's destiny, If you are not born with it then it wasn't meant for you to be no matter how hard you try.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: There are several factors which could not allow people living in poverty to improve their situation, but it also depends on the country those people are from, someone living in poverty in the United States may not have the same reasons of a person living in Japan or Saudi Arabia.In the context of Latin America, it is a mixture of bad governments and a destructive culture.The bad governments are corrupt and misuse the money which is supposed to be injected somehow into the economy of the country, so the population can benefit from it. In the cultural aspect, people here are not aware of what it is the best for them and even though they live with the barely minimum, still decide to have children, buy alcohol, consume drugs or buy unnecessary things, instead seeking education.

comments.author: WillyAp
comments.body: Quote from: OGsmall on March 12, 2023, 03:11:55 PMI have always wanted to ask this question is it that there is no opportunity or they do not want to get rich Mate please more to this I am confused here.You stay poor when you spend all income on liabilities like clothes, cars, phones, gadgets. You need a ferocious willpower to climb out of poverty, family which is tuned to spending won't precisely help. Most poor are born in poverty and to get out is hampered by petty crime, lack of opportunities. All that in general terms, really it goes case by case.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: You don't have to go far to get some answers. Start from yourself for instance. So how is your financial status? Or those around you from families to friends. You have to also get the knowledge that everyone in the world will not be rich or on the other side poor. If you have it that way then nobody would be doing services for each other, you won't have someone called "boss or servant" etc. It all existed in the bible, example Abraham was rich in animals, gold and had lots of servants.To deal with your question anyway, the world is not fair. It doesn't present same opportunity, challenges or circumstances to everyone therefore we deal with what is presented to us differently and we can move out or in of different financial status depending on how we handle what opportunity presented to us. Like you know of certain rich person or family in the past that were rich but today they have turned poor either because they didn't manage what opportunity they had very well and plan ahead against different government policies, environment change (world's global changes) while some poor people take those opportunity to be rich. There are different examples you can find, investment in bitcoin at the early stage or now is opportunity, taking advantage of mobile office or online businesses are some of the world's global changes.

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: Quote from: OGsmall on March 12, 2023, 03:11:55 PMI have always wanted to ask this question is it that there is no opportunity or they do not want to get rich Mate please more to this I am confused here.The poor have no information on what the rich are doing to get out of their misery. If they only know they will also be doing what the rich are doing.Let's say on the geopolitics side, governments and banks are actually accumulating Gold and Silver since the pandemic. So are the rich people who had already foreseen what is going to happen in the next years to come like war and devaluing of currency and because the history of financial collapse will always repeat itself like the 2008 crisis. Therefore, the rich will be hedging thier wealth and will be buying gold and investing in mining companies. Iff the poor only have the money and idea of what's to come, they will also take this as an opportunity.

comments.body: Quote from: OGsmall on March 12, 2023, 03:11:55 PMI have always wanted to ask this question is it that there is no opportunity or they do not want to get rich Mate please more to this I am confused here.Most of this kind of people doesn’t have the courage to level up their game to aim for a better job or business. People just missed their opportunity to grab them because they are most likely scared or doesn’t have self confidence due to their current situation.Most of the people that you mention is most likely from 3rd world country which poverty is very high. They are just accepting whatever they are since that is the norm in their country.

comments.author: Fesatmas
comments.body: The answer is because they don't want to be rich and don't want to find out how to get rich, they are always lazy with the process that has to go through because getting rich is not an easy thing if you build from the ground up. They just often fantasize without taking action to make it happen.Talking about, environment, education, parental teaching, and such things from the outside will have no effect if he really wants to be rich and firm in his convictions.I think they just want to fantasize without wanting to sacrifice their time to improve their abilities. because if you talk about information nowadays it is very easy, it can even be found anywhere if he really is looking for information.

comments.body: Not all the poor remains poor all the time and sometimes there arise an opportunity due to which they get lots of money but one important that they remain poor for lots of time is that money is needed to create more money. There is no any opportunity which is free of cost now online jobs are available but they also needed money and about government job we can say that they just provide fix salary which is available for house uses only. They hardly fulfil their daily uses with such salary. If we talk about another source to create money then we can say about investment which also requires money.

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: Quote from: OGsmall on March 12, 2023, 03:11:55 PMI have always wanted to ask this question is it that there is no opportunity or they do not want to get rich Mate please more to this I am confused here.In my country there are just two factors that I think is that cause of people being poor. Firstly, bad government has a major role to play to provide for it's citizens and to also encourage and bring out the best from the citizens when they are in colleges. There are some people who are good in skill but when the government see  such, they are suppose to develop the skill in that person but instead they will get jealous and kill your talent,if you are not opportune to have financial assistance from anyone. There are so many unemployed graduates roaming around in this street who can add impact to the country's economy if they are employed but instead Nepotism is the order of the day only the politicians hijack these opportunities and give to their friends and family, leaving the poor ones to ravish in poverty. Secondly, this is what I will call laziness. Some people are contented in their poverty way of life and can't make any move to improve their condition. They don't want to take risky to try something new,instead they keep on hoping that they will get rich soon without working for it,and before you know it they are already old and poor.

comments.author: Cryptomiles1
comments.body: Quote from: OGsmall on March 12, 2023, 03:11:55 PMI have always wanted to ask this question is it that there is no opportunity or they do not want to get rich Mate please more to this I am confused here.Do you always asked people if they are hungry to eat? Just as someone who is not hungry can never go to a restaurant to ask for food.

comments.author: _BlackStar
comments.body: Poor and rich are not an option, but basically it is the way of life for each of us. The world facilitates everyone to get opportunities, but not everyone is able to get them. There are many factors, of course but again poor and rich is not an option.Please think about this:1. Do not compare your economic condition with people who are richer than you. Surely, you can never have enough and know how to be grateful.2. Compare yourself with those who are poorer than you, I think you must know that you are a rich man compared to others under you.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: Quote from: OGsmall on March 12, 2023, 03:11:55 PMI have always wanted to ask this question is it that there is no opportunity or they do not want to get rich Mate please more to this I am confused here.There are those people that needs a helping hand to get up and there are those that don't really need but yet, they choose what they are. Laziness does a lot of thing for a person and that stops the joy for going through the process of the riches.While those people that want to be rich but they're doing the wrong process because they only want the quickest way to become rich overnight, they don't become rich and they fall mostly on traps and scams.The biggest factor is about mindset. When you think that you'll be poor forever, you'll be.

comments.author: Jody.Drummer
comments.body: We cannot choose to be born poor or rich, but when we are born poor it doesn't mean we don't have the opportunity to become rich. How to make that happen, yes, by trying and not just sitting idly by while waiting for a miracle to come, that's a ridiculous thing. The process will not be easy, it must be very difficult, but while we try, there is no impossible word. Yes, I understand that fate says otherwise, but that doesn't mean we stop trying, because life is really about trying to be able to live as well as possible, be it in terms of the economy or anything else.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: Wrong lifestyle, wrong mindset, lack of opportunities, negative consequences from early childhood, traumas, depression, toxic environment, low self-esteem, physical disabilities... There are many different possibilities on why someone stays poor and each case has to be identified and studies particularly through observation techniques in order to reach the correct approach on how to revert the situation on the life of the individual, so he can finally start thriving in life.

comments.author: benalexis12
comments.body: Quote from: OGsmall on March 12, 2023, 03:11:55 PMI have always wanted to ask this question is it that there is no opportunity or they do not want to get rich Mate please more to this I am confused here.If there are people who remain poor it is because that is the path they chose. There is a saying that "If you were born poor, it's not your fault, But if you die poor, it's your fault". It seems that life is a matter of choice or Life is a Journey" Don't allow yourself to stay where you are, try to walk or reach the dream you want, make a way and look for opportunities that can help us.
